# Failed stages in pipelines


Metrics are collected at deploy, test and promote stages. Each stage responds with a success=1 or failed=0 status. 

The following tiles show only failed stages, and dimensional analysis

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Deployment Frequency

### Definition
This metric tracks how often a pipeline is triggered by the start of a deployment (when a commit is 'merged' into main).

### What we collect
How many "deploy" stages have started across all "build" environments

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Change Failure Rate

### Definition
This metric measures the % of secure pipelines executions that end in failure.

### What we collect
The difference of Deployment Frequency vs successful "production" "deploy", as a percentage value
